doc:
Jason Patric https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jason_Patric 0 Jason Patric (born June 17, 1966) is an American film, television and stage actor. He is known for his roles in the films The Lost Boys, Rush, Sleepers, Geronimo: An American Legend, Your Friends Neighbors, Narc, The Losers, The Alamo, and Speed 2: Cruise Control. His father was actor/playwright Jason Miller and his maternal grandfather was actor Jackie Gleason. Jason_Patric ( born June_17_,_1966 ) is an_American_film_,_television_and_stage_actor . He is_known for his_roles in the_films The_Lost_Boys , Rush , Sleepers , Geronimo : An_American_Legend , Your_Friends_ , Narc , The_Losers , The_Alamo_,_and_Speed_2 : Cruise_Control . His_father was actor/playwright_Jason_Miller and his_maternal_grandfather was actor_Jackie_Gleason .
